column2:
currentSlide
    Returns the current presentation slide index.

    The returned index is the nominal (i.e., one-based) slide index.

    Returns
    -------
    idx: integer
        Current presentation slide index.

    Examples
    --------
    > currentSlide

    See Also
    --------
    jumpTo, next, numSlides, prev

first()
    Jumps to the first slide.

    Examples
    --------
    > first()

    See Also
    --------
    jumpTo, last, next, prev

jumpTo( n )
    Jumps to a specified slide, where `n` is the nominal slide number.

    Parameters
    ----------
    n: integer
    	Nominal slide number (one-based).

    Examples
    --------
    > jumpTo( 2 )

    See Also
    --------
    next, prev

last()
    Jumps to the last slide.

    Examples
    --------
    > last()

    See Also
    --------
    first, jumpTo, next, prev

next()
    Moves the presentation to the next slide or slide fragment.

    Examples
    --------
    > next()

    See Also
    --------
    first, jumpTo, last, prev

numSlides
    Returns the presentation length.

    Returns
    -------
    len: integer
        Number of slides.

    Examples
    --------
    > numSlides

    See Also
    --------
    currentSlide, jumpTo, next, prev

prev()
    Moves the presentation to the previous slide or slide fragment.

    Examples
    --------
    > prev()

    See Also
    --------
    first, jumpTo, last, next

runSlide()
    Runs slide code.

    Examples
    --------
    > runSlide()

    See Also
    --------
    next, prev
